vote.title: A resolution amending Section 7 of Resolution No. 21-0690 by allocating all the remaining proceeds from the sale of unwanted and unneeded property near the intersection of Forest Lane and Greenville Avenue to costs associated with construction of the new Forest Green Library (1) declaring approximately 37,925 square feet of improved land unwanted and unneeded, located near the intersection of Forest Lane and Greenville Avenue, and authorizing its advertisement for sale by public auction; (2) authorizing a Purchase and Sale Agreement to be prepared for the auctioned surplus property receiving the highest qualified bid that is sold absolute; and (3) waiving the minimum reserve amount - Estimated Revenue: TBD (This item was deferred on April 28, 2021)
